1: God, defend me. Argue my case against those who don't follow you. Save me from liars and those who do evil.
2: God, you are my strength. Why have you rejected me? Why am I sad and troubled by my enemies?
3: Send me your light and truth. They will guide me. Lead me to your holy mountain. Lead me to where you live.
4: I will go to the altar of God, to God who is my joy and happiness. I will praise you with a harp, God, my God.
5: Why am I so sad? Why am I so upset? I should put my hope in God. I should keep praising him, my Savior and my God.
